website_summaries.verdict: This set is the classic version of Scrabble, complete with wooden letter trays and drawstring pouch. An affordable addition to other family-oriented board games such as Monopoly and Life.
pros: Maintains the classic look and game play of vintage Scrabble sets
Affordable price point for casual use
Foldable game board is sturdy, stores easily
cons: No recessed tile holders, so pieces tend to slide on board
Some letters may be missing from set

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 over these and i must say it very annoying that the tiles are bigger than space in the ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought 2 over these and i must say it very annoying that the tiles are bigger than space in the board. i wish i give zero stars. I will not recommend this scrabble for anyone. The more tiles you place the more confused you become because the tiles are bigger than spaces on the board.
customer_reviews.author: KOFI

customer_reviews.title: JUST DO IT
customer_reviews.text: I am 76 years old and had not played Scrabble in many years, but my daughter in Mia ordered one and we played together when I went for a visit. I beat her. Has since played with another daughter and a grand-daughter and beat them also. It is great to keep your mind active and lots of fun also. Nice to sit and play board games with family and friends rather than each playing a game separately on each one's computer.
customer_reviews.author: ladyrs

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: The tiles have the letters printed on instead of engraved and painted. They, and the bag that they come in, have been outsourced to China. The board is flimsy. Scrabble has gone from a quality product to a shadow of what it used to be. Instead of something to keep in the family and use for years, it's now got a disposable feel to it. It would be better to spring for a used older version from Ebay or a garage sale than to buy a new, cheapo version. Maybe they want to nudge you to get the turntable edition (which is very handy), since it is so much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Returned and bought the "deluxe" version. This board is ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned and bought the "deluxe" version. This board is flat and does not spin, so the tiles slide all around when moving it around (or someone has to read the board upside down). Pay the extra for the board with recessed game spaces, so the tiles don't move. The deluxe version also rotates on wheels.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rayborn

customer_reviews.title: A big thumbs up from our family
customer_reviews.text: I grew up playing scrabble and always loved it. Sadly my daughter recently told me that we seriously dropped the ball in her board game education. Amazon to the rescue, I ordered the game and it was delivered the very next day. I can happily say we have played many games of scrabble and she loves it just as much as I do. The board is a little flimsy but you just have to be careful. I love the drawstring bag to keep the letters in and the plastic letter stand work just as good as the old wooden ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, close enough to best classic sets
customer_reviews.text: I had a treasured old English Scrabble set (green box by Spears) with heavy smooth blocks & rounded edges, excellent thick quality board and plastic letter ledges I had been given by an old friend when I was a boy, and had kept in pristine condition. My ex kindly took it. So I researched, and was strongly considering buying the exact replacement, or the American version (red/burgundy). I elected to save my hard-earned dollars & buy the $14 model here. I couldn't be happier. Board is reasonable quality; wood letters are sunken & embossed; plastic shelves are reasonable quality. What's not to like at fourteen dollars over 60 bucks?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic parts - not at all durable
customer_reviews.text: We had a 40+ year old set and recently began playing with our young grandson so decided to buy him his own game as part of his birthday gift. While he was very excited, because he enjoys the game, we were very disappointed because the parts are not made of wood, like our older set, but of hard plastic. Its not at all durable. I don't expect he'll have his 40 years from now, but I do expect we'll have ours.
customer_reviews.author: EVaz

customer_reviews.title: Love this game!
customer_reviews.text: Although I cannot believe how much they charged for this game, I was replacing my old board which I’ve gotten torn and tattered after having it for 20 years. I absolutely love this game. Our whole family plays it whenever we’re together. I think every family should have a scrabble game. It helps you think fast, increases your ability to spell and it keeps your mind sharp. The shipping was quick. I was just astounded by how much it cost now.
customer_reviews.author: Erika N. Harris

customer_reviews.title: The same game I had as a child.
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful, educational game to pass the time and stretch the muscles of the mind. Keep in mind that all players should be around the same level of education. A smarter person - especially one who reads a lot, plays puzzles - knows words. That's all that's required. Oh and a dictionary for those who don't believe your word is real. This person will dominate the game and psychologically discourage others for their stupidity.
customer_reviews.author: Randall New

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy board, plastic tile holders .. even the tiles are lighter weight & flimsy.. Don't bother buying this unless you like cheaply made garbage.. there is a Retro board that is only a few dollars more. Do yourself a favor & buy that one instead
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly B.

customer_reviews.title: Broken tiles
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and haven’t had the game since I was a kid myself. Sadly the quality is just not the same. As others note the plastic tile holder is not as nice as wood. Also some of the tiles are broken. I have attached a picture. The game itself is fun so that’s two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Geoduck

customer_reviews.title: New design to Scrabble; not an improvement
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the bag; it doesn't allow one to mix the tiles properly. I did not like the board. We've only had it a little while and it has already warped. It would be nice if one could buy a Scrabble set, including a turntable and a dictionary. Cell phones are not very useful and computers are inconvenient for looking up words. It would be nice if there were a score pad and pencil. Maybe even a calculator. We had those on hand, sort of, but just think how much nicer a gift it could be!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Fun Family Game
customer_reviews.text: Hubby got this on Prime day. He wanted a old school game he enjoyed to spend time with our 3rd and 6th grader. He was torn with the classic version which came with wooden tile holders and a plastic bag, or this version with red plastic tile holders and a cloth bag. We are happy with the choice. The cloth bag is OK quality. Board seems like it's the standard game board.
customer_reviews.author: maggie who

customer_reviews.title: Classic Scrabble
customer_reviews.text: Great Classic Board Game. The one negative is the holder for each of your pieces is now a hard plastic when long ago it use to be a wooden holder which reflects my 4 stars. It was a cheap move to change. Worth what I paid as the rest is durable. I’m assuming most makes are this way now unless you want a more deluxe set which costs more. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: meshelle

customer_reviews.title: Always a classic, but wish they had wooden letter tile holders
customer_reviews.text: I love Scrabble and bought this when I saw it was on sale for $10. However, I was disappointed to discover that the tile holders were red plastic instead of wood. The game board seems a bit flimsy, too, which is unfortunate. However, we still had fun playing and I appreciate the felt bag to keep the tiles in so they don't spill everywhere! It's still a nice addition to our burgeoning board game collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game is fine, but shipping "packaging" was not appropriate
customer_reviews.text: The game itself is fine if you're looking for a basic Scrabble. I'm sure there are higher quality versions out there with better letter tiles, but this is sufficient for just starting to learn the game or testing to see if your children are interested. The packaging the game was sent in, however, was pathetic. They placed the game box in a poly mailer and the box arrived damaged. The game can still be used, but if you're like I am, you'll be twitching that your brand new box isn't in tip-top condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Scrabble Debacle
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved this younger Friendlier version of this “Scrabble “ game. After establishing the ’given’ rules the kids were all ready to go right at it As to be expected with a group of unruly mismatched aged children- it all went to H-E-Double Hockey Sticks. Albeit,many laughs and tuns of fun was had by all. Next attempt will be taken seriously and played strictly by the rules 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Ettebl

customer_reviews.title: This is some pretty good quality stuff for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is some pretty good quality stuff for the price. Yes, as everyone else is complaining..the letter racks are plastic, but that doesn't really affect the play of the game. The board and the letters themselves are both wooden and seem sturdy enough to last for a while. Are there better and more luxurious boards out there? Sure, but they cost as whole lot more. If you want a game with a turntable, wooden racks and letters that slot in perfectly to groves cut into the board, go for it by all means. If you want a cost effective game that isn't so tacky that it compromises the game itself..this is what you're looking for
customer_reviews.author: Tanmay

customer_reviews.title: It’s Scrabble!
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a Scrabble Board Game. The board is thick. You get four wooden boards to hold the wooden tiles on. The tiles are a tad bit bigger than the squares in the board but not like a game changer just an OCD thing. LOL It’s a great game for family game night, or have a few friends over.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great game delivered  4 days early, excellent service !
customer_reviews.text: My family has always like this smart and strategic word game. Would like to thank the Seller. This item was delivered today to my mom on her birthday ( yay!), which is 4 days earlier than the estimated delivery date. Thank you! My mom loved it. Excellent quarantine gift
customer_reviews.author: Dana k. carlson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love Scrabble and this game has everything we need. If I were to give a fair review anout the wood pieces then it's similar to the wood from chopsticks a few pieces had tattered edges. Not quite like the quality u used to have as a kid. I also don't expected the bars to be if a different material but it was sturdy and nice. All in all we are happy. This is the type if game to treasure.
customer_reviews.author: Kinu

customer_reviews.title: Still fun and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Entertaining classic game of scrabble. However, only the game play was the classic version. The game itself (Board and tiles) do not have the same smooth feel of the original scrabble game. If you want to go that classic, you will have to spend more money. Still fun and entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki C

customer_reviews.title: Vendor is Straight Up
customer_reviews.text: Amazon, I did not receive this package but I let the vendor know and they are checking into the issue. We have had issues with our Local postal service So I feel confident they will get to the bottom if it. Also the game is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as it teaches one how to quickly put letters into words, great game if you have kids and are trying to do something fun and knowledgeable at the same time. It'll help with spellings too and you might learn words too in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Be

customer_reviews.title: poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: The tiles isnt square shaped, they are rectangulars and doesnt fit to the board, poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: ReaverArt

customer_reviews.title: Looove this game for whole family
customer_reviews.text: My title sounds corny buts it's TRUE! My video game playing 11 year old never played before and was not interested.... after the 2nd time playing he was hooked! It's great for the little ones and big ones and all in between. ..
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and cheerful
customer_reviews.text: For a cheaper option, this set is fine and allows for great game playing. A few minor 'grouses'. The tiles are not very consistent in size - not bad, but not all exactly the same size. The wood of the tiles is very light (I'm not sure what type of wood, but not the heavier beech wood that my old set was made from). Now a few good points. The printing is clear and easy to see (my wife doesn't have very good eyesight, but can see these tiles easily). The board seems substantial enough for longevity, although the side panel seems to be bigger (wider) than necessary. All in all, good value.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Hamner

customer_reviews.title: Great classic boardgame
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift. Great classic game. Only complaint is one of the wooden tile pieces was shorter than the others. Otherwise I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: All you need for a game of Scrabble!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1)sturdy board, pouch, and piece holder. I got this delivered within 24 hours which is incredible. 2) The packaging also makes it extremely convenient to store and take it along on a trip. 3) Can't beat the price! Cons: None Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ajith

customer_reviews.title: I love scrabble but this is not very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love Scrabble but this is not very good quality. Some of the numbers are missing on the tiles and the board cracked in the middle. The paper released from the board in the center after a few times playing. Just feels very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: angi jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good version of the classic
customer_reviews.text: Nice version of Scrabble. The board on this is bi-fold and opens OUT, so the board should last a good long time. It's the oldschool board with the letter distribution printed so either player can see it. The only thing about this version that might put off a purist is the typeface, which is slightly different from the original Scrabble. I think it looks good, and all my tiles are very consistent and well-engraved. So, if you are looking for an affordable version of the Scrabble you remember, this is one to consider. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: A good game and fun
customer_reviews.text: My son and I played our first game of Scrabble tonight, and it was a really nice interaction time with him. It's a wonderful family game, and a nice way to spend time with each other. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: MAN W.

customer_reviews.title: As expected scrabble
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved this game; we play it at my parent's house when we visit home, so now I bought one for my home. We have been playing it frequently during the COVID isolation. Looks exactly as it should. The original real game. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Where are the wooden letter racks?
customer_reviews.text: This game is always fun, but I do miss the original wooden letter rack. It's now a red plastic and the bag that holds the letters is a super cheap black bag. It's still the same game, though, so definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiles don't fit squares
customer_reviews.text: Game word squares are too small for the tiles. Everything is out of wack. Tiles don't fit so you cannot score properly and it's hard to figure out where to place the tiles. Instead of returning it I glued felt onto the board. We are now just using it as a learning too for the kids with spelling. So not a total loss.
customer_reviews.author: JesusIsKing

customer_reviews.title: Would get the locking tiles one instead
customer_reviews.text: This item was as expected, but after using it, I wish I would have gotten the one with the locking tiles. It is only 5 dollars more and would be nice to not have the tiles move around.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: The letter stands are plastic. I wished it was still wood like I remembered as a kid but overall lots of fun for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CCMG

customer_reviews.title: Classic scrabble game
customer_reviews.text: This is your classic scrabble game. My only reason for not giving it five stars is there seems to be a lack of quality control as several of the pieces are not square and some of the writing is extremely faded or worn off.
customer_reviews.author: IDesign

customer_reviews.title: Good board but letter pieces were broken
customer_reviews.text: It is a great board to play on, but some of the wooden letter pieces had holes in them, and a couple were completely broken :(
customer_reviews.author: Shyla

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this purchase. The description states that the games comes with 4 tile racks. We only received 3. The box was smashed along one side. Very poor presentation. We told our kids we would play a family game of Scrabble tonight because we knew it would be delivered today but we don't have enough tile racks for all of us. Big fail Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Tiles need stabilization
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is....recommend spending extra for a magnetic board or one that holds the tiles in their places. They move very easy on this board which upsets the whole game
customer_reviews.author: Read This!

customer_reviews.title: Meh, it works.
customer_reviews.text: These boards are pretty cheaply made these days, and this is no exception. The letters are really lightweight and move around a lot--this product could be improved a lot in terms of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Privacy Protected -J

customer_reviews.title: Old Classic For Game Night
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our Family Game Nights. I loved this game as a child and wanted to share it with my kids. I hadn't played the game in years, and I had to read up on the instructions which were easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: A timeless classic! Never gets old
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have so much fun playing scrabble! Some nights we just turn the tv off and play this for hours! Its a great way to spend time with family and helps vocabulary at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Davis

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we expected
customer_reviews.text: exactly what we expected however after purchasing and playing this game looking back I would buy the one where the letters clip in. this would just help make the game easier and I believe we would play it more with that feature. spend the extra money
customer_reviews.author: Bettina

customer_reviews.title: It was fine
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I kind of wish I had not gone cheap and spent some extra dollars on a better one. It's not terrible it's like a regular board game but I know it's going to end up splitting at the fold soon.
customer_reviews.author: ramon

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed in the quality of this scrabble
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in the quality of this scrabble... the letters are very light, and are different sizes..the board is thin and flimsy.. I regret purchasing this item
customer_reviews.author: Alex Jones

customer_reviews.title: It's Scrabble! Yay!
customer_reviews.text: The classic game you grew up with! I will say, I was bummed to see that the stands are now plastic instead of wood; just feels cheaper. That being said though, it's been a great time playing and kicking my boyfriend's butt during quarantine! :-)
customer_reviews.author: DGLovesStuff

customer_reviews.title: Big joke
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the fact that there is a list of all the letters in the alphabet on the side of the board . It took me about three games in to realize my husband was counting tiles because of this . He knew exactly what letters I had because u tell on the board how many tiles are for each letter . No Bueno!
customer_reviews.author: Stine4evafabs

customer_reviews.title: Tacky version of such a timeless game 🤥
customer_reviews.text: How sad that this game comes with cheap plastic letter racks which I will have to replace. Also it doesn’t even come with a bag for the letters.
customer_reviews.author: BetteAnn

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend upgrading to a magnetic board or one where there ...
customer_reviews.text: It's the full set and includes all the goodies, tiles, playing board and four racks plus the game guide. My only complaint is the board is completely flat. This makes it difficult to keep the tiles straight at the game is played. I would recommend upgrading to a magnetic board or one where there are slots for the tiles. But as a introductory model, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: A Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I haven't played in some years and this was so much fun. Make sure you get the Scrabble dictionary if you are serious about winning!
customer_reviews.author: L. Layton

customer_reviews.title: Break time, put the devices down!
customer_reviews.text: Played this game with our 17 year old & 9 year old and its a hit. Helps with bonding / family time during QUARANTINE. Fun game and if you want the kiddos to break away from their devices, this is it, chief!
customer_reviews.author: Skylar RT mommy

customer_reviews.title: Basic Parts Missing
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed due to one VERY big problem. There are NO SCOREBOARDS. Now in a game of scrabble after making words fun comes when you can keep record of score to make the game competitive. NOW TELL ME PEOPLE WHO SHIPPED IT? How will some one keep record of score.... Due to this crazy time I am stuck with this board game and can’t go out to Return the package. Basically I will looted (somehwat)
customer_reviews.author: Diwakar

customer_reviews.title: TEFL Game
customer_reviews.text: I teach English overseas and Scrabble is a great way to teach/reinforce vocabulary; students enjoy it, too.
customer_reviews.author: tefljudy

customer_reviews.title: Box Damage
customer_reviews.text: This Scrabble game is adequate for my needs; it isn't, however, the quality of the game I grew up with - plastic tile racks, lighter, less "quality-looking" tiles, average board. It's ok for the price I paid, but the main reason I'm writing is the game box had one corner that was crushed INSIDE A PERFECTLY FINE AMAZON BOX. This obviously means it was shipped that way. Very careless on the part of the Amazon employee that packed this!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Montalbano

customer_reviews.title: Great classic Scrabble game!
customer_reviews.text: Standard, traditional Scrabble game. Has red, plastic letter holders, but past that pretty much like the one I had 50 years ago as a child.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Love scrabble, great game for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love scrabble, great game for the price, just wish I had spent the couple of extra bucks to get the board that the tiles stick into. Tiles move around a bit too much while playing and can sometimes get messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Montalto

customer_reviews.title: but the plastic holders are not nearly as nice as the wooden ones which are less easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: It is scrabble, but the plastic holders are not nearly as nice as the wooden ones which are less easy to knock around. I guess everything is made cheaper. I would rather pay a little more and get things made well.
customer_reviews.author: Joni J. Schultheis

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Like the cheaper price but it's also have inexpensive parts unlike the more expensive games. The letters easily move around and don't lock in place. Appreciate the price though. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Scrabble!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't played board games in years! I had forgotten how much fun they are. Hours of quality time spent with my family! Quick shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Moultrie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you thought it was. No surprises.
customer_reviews.text: It's Scrabble! No surprises here. Basic board, 4 trays and a black velveteen bag for the tiles. Taught my 8.5yo to play and now she's kinda obsessed. And the 5yo acts as the Tile Master, giving us tiles when we need more, since she can count, but can't read.
customer_reviews.author: evilmasterfoo

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I was on bed for A month when I bought this one. Our family loved playing it. It's presentation is nice and the pieces are made from wood which looks nice and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Shubhra Bhushan

customer_reviews.title: No scoreboard, small light weight pieces
customer_reviews.text: I knew what I was getting to get..the letters are slightly smaller than what I have played inpast. But it's great for kids to learn vocabulary. My favorite board game. There is no scoreboard provided
customer_reviews.author: AshX

customer_reviews.title: Classic Scrabble game, newIsh look.
customer_reviews.text: Classic Scrabble with the exception of the wooden tile holders, they are now plastic. Other than that, good deal.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Game night fun.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice scrabble game which is perfect for gift giving BUT bought for myself. We have “family” gamenight and one of our favorites.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: It would be great if I exchange yo better one, thanks
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to return and we have been experiencing lockdown the entire country. The picture was better but the box is not as I expected. I wanted little fancy one..!
customer_reviews.author: faiza joiyah

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a fancy game board and pieces, but it is nice for the family to get started. My main goal is to get the kids thinking about how to spell words and broaden their vocabulary
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Stednitz

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The boyfriend and I love scrabble. I wanted to buy him the original game and he loved it! It also comes with a cute pouch to hold all the letters!
customer_reviews.author: Jojomedic

customer_reviews.title: Fine for what it is
customer_reviews.text: This scrabble does the job but as others stated, the quality isn't the best. One of the tiles was already partially broken and the tiles are different sizes. Will upgrade in the future for a nicer version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap version compared to 10 years ago
customer_reviews.text: Man what a cheap version. Pieces made of top-quality wood. 20 years ago the quality was 10 times better. Sure cheap made
customer_reviews.author: John Malczewski

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: My 20 year old daughter and I played every night during our quarantine. Started with a lot of 3 letter words, but we were really impressed with our word growth over our quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Great Game to Play at this Time!
customer_reviews.text: A great game to play at this time; Great seller, arrived early and safely.
customer_reviews.author: Chipmunka

customer_reviews.title: Too much plastic
customer_reviews.text: Plastic tile holders—Who decided this? Part of the appeal is the aesthetic element of wood tiles and wood tiles holder. I feel so dissatisfied with this game board.
customer_reviews.author: BitterCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic competition
customer_reviews.text: Even if you don't like spelling this game will get you thinking and will turn into an all out war wheather you are an adult or kid. It's always and will always be fun
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fun Time!
customer_reviews.text: Scrabble brings those together who have not seen each other in a long time, or, play just for family fun time. Uses the imagination in a way that only the players know. Players decipher letters and add numbers with great laughter and conversation. A must have game for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Well2Do

customer_reviews.title: Keep your vocabulary strong little one
customer_reviews.text: Scrabble is such a classic game, more people need to play this more often since words like "Bling", "Bromance", "Chillax" and "Crunk" are now in the official English Dictionary.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: No spell check, plenty of vowels
customer_reviews.text: Even with your step-father is an esoteric engineer, racks up a ton of points and then plays a made-up word when you can't challenge him, this game is a blast. Gave as a wedding gift to a lawyer and his bride...this should be interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Maree LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Love Scrabble! We were playing with a travel set ...
customer_reviews.text: Love Scrabble! We were playing with a travel set and it's so much nicer to have larger letters, a larger board. I love that this set comes with a bag to hold the letter tiles. The version I had as a kid, we were constantly losing tiles and having to make our own lol
customer_reviews.author: Amzon Cust

customer_reviews.title: Basic edition. Nothing fancy. Plays as well as the fancy ones v
customer_reviews.text: Bought for me. No bells or whistles, just plain old Scrabble, which my family loves to play.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer AE Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Wife wins too often
customer_reviews.text: Lots of challenging fun. Rated 4 stars only because wife wins 9 out of 10 times we play!
customer_reviews.author: VA Security & Electronics

customer_reviews.title: Classic game
customer_reviews.text: Not sure there's much to say. It's Scrabble. If you enjoy it, cool! If you don't, also cool. We do. It's made well. It's fun.
customer_reviews.author: AllergyMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I decided to get this game to reduce our time watching TV and help challenge our minds.
customer_reviews.author: John R Comins

customer_reviews.title: Fun Quarantine Game!!
customer_reviews.text: Its a fun game for the quarantine times. Small size so easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: It's SCRABBLE, what's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: Quality as expected for the price. It may be cheaply made, but it does the job. It would be nice if there was a more solidly manufactured board at a higher price, something in between this version and the deluxe "turntable" sets.
customer_reviews.author: myle

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with a classic
customer_reviews.text: Classic game, bought for my elderly mom for quarantine activity
customer_reviews.author: Aok

customer_reviews.title: Always a classic board game to have.
customer_reviews.text: Great scrabble package. all intact. I had expected the pieces to be real wood and the letter stands to be wood too, only they were plastic. Otherwise fine. Already played a game and lost with my significant other!
customer_reviews.author: Tommi

customer_reviews.title: Poor Packing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve played scrabble before and it’s a fun game so I have no issue with the game itself. My problem is that the box came in with dents and tears in it. I buy board games all the time and haven’t received one in such poor condition until now.
customer_reviews.author: Adrielle

customer_reviews.title: Love the game
customer_reviews.text: Love the game but with little kids don't get to play as much as I wish to.
customer_reviews.author: adrianna1026

customer_reviews.title: a dreat game for the entire family
customer_reviews.text: An entertaining word game for both adults and children. highly recommended for families in quarantine because of Covid 19, good to teach children how to spell
customer_reviews.author: ANNE LINDSAY-SMITH

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, so don't expect much. As basic as it gets for Scrabble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Good game and strategy thinking. It is game to increase vocabulary and truly think. So I got it for my home
customer_reviews.author: Denise Mullarkey

customer_reviews.title: Itsbettyeboop
customer_reviews.text: Love Scrabble. This is kind of cheap. Because the board is not grooved the pieces move around a lot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of Scrabble. Only complaint about this version is that the board is flat, as opposed to the kind with the divots, so the pieces slide around very easily. I'm a bit spastic when it comes to board games and if you even bump the board you'll have letters all over the place. So if you're like me, get the other version.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for an eager learner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this game for my 7 year old son. Love to see how good his spelling is getting.
customer_reviews.author: Vangy mejia

customer_reviews.title: Great family game
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting this game for awhile to play with my family, especially my kids (11 & 7 years) so they could learn more on different words & proper spelling. All the stores I went to wanted over $20 for it. I found this on Amazon for a much better deal. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Chala Sipone

customer_reviews.title: Scrabbler
customer_reviews.text: It's scrabble. The only thing you can get wrong is missing letters
customer_reviews.author: Ryck

customer_reviews.title: Still the classic scrabble game
customer_reviews.text: Still the same classic game we know, nothing new with this item. It looks durable and has the complete set, only difference with this particular item we got was one of the tile holders look like it was cut irregularly but no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: John Robert

customer_reviews.title: quality of game pieces is in decline
customer_reviews.text: Decades ago, the Scrabble puzzle came with polished letters which were slightly larger and with a larger board. This one lacks that sort of quality. It comes with plastic letter holders - the old ones were made of wood. The game is the same, but the quality has declined over the years.
customer_reviews.author: DeRavenSey

customer_reviews.title: Just love this game.
customer_reviews.text: Scrabble is a timeless game. I think a must have for your home.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

product_meta.title: Scrabble Game
product_meta.description:
Put letters together, build words, add up your points and win! This classic game features the classic Scrabble equipment for a big-time word-on-word showdown. Do you see a word your opponent hasn't seen. A double or triple letter or word space that will let you earn big points. Could the luck of the draw win you the game. Use your letters to score points and challenge your family and friends. It’s your word against theirs! Scrabble and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro. For 2-4 players

BRAND STORY
By Hasbro Games

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Hasbro is committed to being an ethical and responsible company and is a recognized toy industry leader in the areas of product safety, environmental sustainability, ethical sourcing and philanthropy.

See more
